programme.title: Traffic Cops (?)
programme.desc: A man who attempts to run from two patrolling officers in Grimsby, Lincolnshire, only succeeds in leading the pair to a friend of his who is hiding Class A drugs. Elsewhere, a cannabis farm is discovered in a seemingly normal terraced house in Halifax, a routine stop in Doncaster, South Yorkshire, leads to a teenager admitting she is on the run, and a chase involving one of Sheffield's most wanted men is caught on the headcams. Narrated by Jamie Theakston(n)

programme.title: Traffic Cops (?)
programme.desc: Officers in Bedfordshire arm themselves with 50,000-volt Tasers when they are called to make a difficult arrest. A lone traffic cop is set upon by a gang of youths in Luton town centre, and a desperate teenager in a stolen car leads police on a hair-raising pursuit. Narrated by Jamie Theakston(n)

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer (?)
programme.desc: Martin Roberts explores two terraced properties about to be auctioned in West Bromwich and Telford, while Lucy Alexander catches up with the owners of a bungalow in Gillingham in Kent, 18 months after she first visited(n)

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer (?)
programme.desc: In East Devon, Martin Roberts visits a flat in Budleigh Salterton that needs a bit of work to get it back in shape, while in Northern Ireland a terraced property in Downpatrick requires a new lease of life. Plus, Lucy Alexander meets the buyer of a plot of land in Abbey Wood, south-east London, who has big plans for its future(n)

programme.title: Escape to the Country (?)
programme.desc: Nicki Chapman helps a couple from Wimbledon, south-west London, find a four-bedroom detached home in the Surrey countryside with a large kitchen-diner and a garage suitable for housing a classic car. They also require train links for a commute to the capital and want to be close to a good school, but their budget of £700,000 may not match their extensive wish-list(n)

programme.title: Escape to the Country (?)
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton gallops through the Buckinghamshire property market in search of the perfect equestrian home for a young couple who have an £800,000 pounds to work within(n)

programme.title: DIY SOS (?)
programme.sub-title: DIY SOS: The Big Build: Halifax
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team come to the aid of a couple in Halifax, West Yorkshire, whose eight-year-old son is paralysed and can only access two rooms in their house. The family home is in need of a major overhaul but with only nine days to complete the job, the gang needs help - and that's where local tradesmen and other members of the community come in, turning up in force to bring designer Gabrielle Blackman's ideas to life(n)

programme.title: DIY SOS (?)
programme.sub-title: DIY SOS: The Big Build: Misterton
programme.desc: Since his wife died shortly after giving birth to their sixth child, Paul Makings has been valiantly holding the family together as they grieve. But he's facing even more problems - living in a two-bedroom house he has started to extend, and forced to sleep on the sofa. Nick Knowles and the team are joined by more than 100 locals in Misterton, Nottinghamshire, as they take on their biggest home build ever. However, they have to battle against a blizzard to complete the job in nine days(n)

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (?)
programme.desc: A couple want to swap their stressful city life, so Jenni Falconer helps them search for a property with a sea view on the Jurassic Coast of southern England(n)

programme.title: Fantasy Homes by the Sea (?)
programme.desc: Phil and Linzi are desperate to relocate to Majorca, where they met and worked together for years. After running a coffee shop in Great Yarmouth, Norfolk, for seven years, the pair have decided it is time to relocate permanently to the island. With a budget of £350,000 and two large dogs to accommodate, Jenni Falconer has her work cut out to help the duo secure the ideal coastal property(n)

programme.title: DIY SOS (?)
programme.sub-title: DIY SOS: The Big Build: Manchester
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team come to the aid of Manchester couple Rebecca and Steve, whose life was changed for ever when they found out they were expecting triplets. Two years on, Rebecca is becoming depressed by the state of their small, damp, dilapidated house, which is unsafe for the children. The builders have just nine days to bring the property up to date and give this tired mum and dad the space they need for their active offspring. Luckily, local tradespeople and other members of the community turn out in force to help(n)

programme.title: Obsessive Compulsive Cleaners (?)
programme.desc: Ben spends up to two hours a day cleaning his kitchen hob despite the fact he has only used it once, and doesn't sleep in his bed for fear of creasing the sheets. He heads to Guildford, Surrey, to meet upholsterer and craft enthusiast Gerri, whose home is stuffed with three years' worth of material waiting to be upcycled. Also waging a war on dirt is Sarah, who became obsessed with cleanliness after having her first baby. She travels to Coventry to help brothers Andy and Mikk, but is shocked to find an untidy living room and a wall being used as a dartboard on her arrival(n)

programme.title: Oxford Street Revealed (?)
programme.desc: The documentary reveals the inner workings of Britain's busiest station, Oxford Circus, as passenger numbers become so great that the staff are forced to close its doors. Plus, police set out to arrest a homeless man who has his own `place' on the thoroughfare and pop star Nicole Scherzinger shops at HMV(n)

programme.title: Embarrassing Bodies (?)
programme.desc: Christian Jessen revisits two people who have undergone operations to change their gender. programme.desc: In a world where the asteroid impact that wiped out the dinosaurs never happened, humans have evolved as a primitive species while the giant lizards remain the dominant life form on Earth. A young apatosaurus becomes separated from his family, but finds a friend in a feral human boy as he makes the dangerous journey home. Pixar animated adventure, with the voices of Raymond Ochoa and Jack Bright(n)

programme.title: Frozen Fever (?)
programme.desc: Animated short featuring the characters from Disney's Oscar-winning Frozen, with the voices of Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel and Josh Gad(n)

programme.title: Toy Story 2 (?)
programme.desc: Cowboy doll Woody is stolen by an unscrupulous toy collector, who knows he is worth a fortune as a collectible, prompting fearless Space Ranger Buzz Lightyear to lead a daring across-town mission to rescue him. However, Woody is tempted to spend his life languishing in the safety of a museum rather than face the prospect of his owner growing up. Animated sequel, featuring the voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack and Kelsey Grammer(n)

programme.title: The Lion King (?)
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones(n)

programme.title: The Jungle Book (?)
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungle, leading a carefree life with his friends, a laidback bear and a wise panther. The return of a ferocious tiger who hates humans places the youngster's life in danger, and his friends must persuade him to return to the safety of his own people. Disney animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, with the voices of Phil Harris and George Sanders(n)

programme.title: Ratatouille (?)
programme.desc: A rat finds his love of fine food has made him an outcast to his less discerning family. Separated from his fellow rodents by a storm, he winds up in a famous French restaurant, where he helps an incompetent kitchen assistant become the greatest chef in Paris. Pixar animated comedy from the director of The Incredibles, with the voices of Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano and Peter O'Toole(n)

programme.title: WALL.E (?)
programme.desc: In the far future, waste collection robot WALL.E is the only unit left to clean up a desolate and dilapidated Earth. But when a survey droid arrives to search for any signs of life, WALL.E is lovestruck and hitches a ride on the spaceship sent to collect her, embarking on a journey that could determine the future of the human race. Pixar animated sci-fi adventure, with the voices of Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard and Sigourney Weaver(n)

programme.title: Dumbo (?)
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace(n)

programme.title: The Secret of Moonacre (?)
programme.desc: When her father dies, 13-year-old Maria is sent to live with her eccentric uncle in Moonacre Manor. The youngster finds herself drawn into a magical conflict when she learns she is destined to become the last Moon Princess and is charged with unearthing secrets of the past to prevent the mystical kingdom disappearing forever. Fantasy adventure set in the 19th century, starring Dakota Blue Richards, Ioan Gruffudd and Tim Curry(n)

programme.title: Freaky Friday (?)
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke(n)

programme.title: Maya the Bee Movie (?)
programme.desc: A curious young bee befriends a number of other insects, despite her hive's strict rules on not associating with outsiders. When some of the Queen bee's royal jelly is stolen, she is accused of the crime and needs the help of her friends to track down the real culprits. Animated adventure based on Waldemar Bonsels' children's book, with the voices of Coco Jack Gillies and Kodi Smit-McPhee(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie (?)
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis(n)

programme.title: The Great Gilly Hopkins (?)
programme.desc: A feisty foster kid comes up with an outlandish scheme to be reunited with her birth mum. Coming-of-age drama, starring Kathy Bates, Glenn Close and Sophie Nelisse(n)

programme.title: Hook (?)
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielberg's fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair (?)
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto(n)

programme.title: Ocean's 11 (?)
programme.desc: Former army sergeant Danny Ocean enlists the help of his service friends from the Second World War to steal a fortune from five Las Vegas casinos at the same time. To smuggle the money out of Sin City though will prove a tougher prospect. Comedy thriller, starring Frank Sinatra, Sammy Davis Jr, Dean Martin, Peter Lawford, Richard Conte, Angie Dickinson and Cesar Romero, plus cameos by Red Skelton and George Raft(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift (?)
programme.desc: An American teenager is sent to live with his father in Tokyo after a brush with the law, but soon becomes involved in illegal street racing. When he ends up owing money to gangsters after losing a race against a driver with Yakuza connections, he has to learn to master the Japanese style of driving to win and pay back his debts. Action adventure, starring Lucas Black, Nathalie Kelley and Bow Wow(n)

programme.title: SWAT (?)
programme.desc: A cop's career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie (?)
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller, recreating the 1944 plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler using a briefcase bomb. As the tide of the Second World War turns in favour of the Allies, a group of senior German officers recruits war hero Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg to spearhead an attempt on the Fuehrer's life. Starring Tom Cruise, Kenneth Branagh, Bill Nighy and Tom Wilkinson(n)

programme.title: Minority Report (?)
programme.desc: Cop John Anderton is forced to go on the run when a supposedly infallible trio of psychics foretell he is about to kill a man he has never heard of. Convinced their prediction is false, he kidnaps one of the so-called precogs to prove his innocence - and stumbles across a complex conspiracy. Steven Spielberg's futuristic thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton and Max von Sydow(n)

programme.title: The Prestige (?)
programme.desc: Victorian stage illusionists Robert Angier and Alfred Borden engage in a bitter personal and professional rivalry. The pair resort to increasingly brutal measures to sabotage each other's acts, while Angier becomes obsessed with the secret behind Borden's greatest illusion. Christopher Nolan's mystery thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo and Scarlett Johansson, with David Bowie as real-life scientific pioneer Nikola Tesla(n)

programme.title: Taken (?)
programme.desc: An American teenager travelling through Europe is abducted by a gang of sex traffickers. However, what the kidnappers do not realise is that the girl's father is a former CIA agent, who employs all his old skills as he searches for the criminals and tries to rescue his daughter. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Famke Janssen and Maggie Grace(n)

programme.title: True Deception (?)
programme.desc: An author struggling with writer's block and drug addiction becomes fascinated with a high-profile murder trial, especially when a friend of the defendant confesses to murders he probably did not commit. He is determined to find out why he would do such a thing, finding parallels with his own father. Drama based on Stephen Elliot's novel The Adderall Diaries, starring James Franco, Ed Harris, Amber Heard and Christian Slater(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie (?)
programme.desc: The tyrannical Ivan Ooze is accidentally released from his super-secure prison by dim-witted construction workers after 6,000 years in captivity. Vowing to conquer the Earth, he unleashes a reign of terror on Los Angeles - leaving the colour-coded champions fighting to save the world from his evil clutches. Sci-fi adventure, starring Paul Freeman, David Yost, Jason David Frank, Steve Cardenas, Karan Ashley and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: Turbo: A Power Rangers Movie (?)
programme.desc: Arch-villainess Divatox plots to take over the Earth by corrupting the powers of a kindly old wizard, and only the colour-coded crusaders, joined by old team-mates Jason and Kimberley, stand in her way. Sci-fi adventure, with Jason David Frank and Johnny Yong Bosch(n)

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island Special (?)
programme.desc: Sky Cinema takes a special look at the action-packed creature feature starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson, John Goodman and Brie Larson(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (?)
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee(n)

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (?)

programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his untimely death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged(n)

programme.title: Bad Words (?)
programme.desc: Jason Bateman directs and stars in this dark comedy about a 40-year-old misanthrope who enters children's spelling contests. With Kathryn Hahn, Rohan Chand and Philip Baker Hall(n)

programme.title: Up for Love (?)
programme.desc: A diminutive architect woos a beautiful lawyer over the phone, but it remains to be seen whether his stature will prove a stumbling block. French romantic comedy, starring Jean Dujardin, Virginie Efira and Cedric Kahn(n)

programme.title: The Revenant (?)
programme.desc: A frontiersman leading a hunting party through the wilderness is mauled by a bear, and a travelling companion who pledged to stay with him until help comes kills his son and leaves him for dead. Against all odds, the wounded man survives his injuries and embarks on a gruelling quest for revenge that takes him through a harsh landscape. Western, starring an Oscar-winning Leonardo DiCaprio, with Tom Hardy and Domhnall Gleeson(n)

Alfred Hitchcock's psychological thriller, starring Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles, Martin Balsam, John Gavin and John McIntire(n)

programme.desc: Oppressed Mexican villagers cross the border into America looking to buy guns to defend their homes and crops from bandits. Instead they encounter an enigmatic loner who persuades them to hire a band of gunslingers to teach the villagers how to fight before the marauders return. Western, with Yul Brynner, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Robert Vaughn, James Coburn and Eli Wallach(n)

programme.title: The Darjeeling Limited (?)
programme.desc: Three brothers drift apart after their father's death. A year later, the eldest arranges for the other two to join him on a soul-searching trip across India to rebuild their relationship and track down their estranged mother. Wes Anderson's comedy drama, starring Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman and Anjelica Huston(n)

programme.desc: Creepy couple Morticia and Gomez find their unconventional life threatened by a man claiming to be a long-lost relative. When they welcome him with open arms, they fall prey to a plot that could cost them their ancestral home and the family fortune. Black comedy based on the 1960s TV series, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci, Jimmy Workman and Carel Struycken(n)

programme.title: Rango (?)
programme.desc: A pet chameleon with an active imagination ends up lost in the desert. He makes his way to a lawless town of animals, where he is mistaken for a deadly gunslinger and made sheriff. He organises the townsfolk into a posse when bandits led by an evil rattlesnake steal their supply of water. Oscar-winning animated comedy, with the voices of Johnny Depp, Isla Fisher and Bill Nighy(n)

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Terror by Night (?)
programme.desc: The legendary sleuth and his faithful sidekick Dr Watson hunt for the killer of an aristocrat who hired them to keep a priceless diamond out of the hands of thieves. Mystery, starring Basil Rathbone, Nigel Bruce, Alan Mowbray, Dennis Hoey and Mary Forbes(n)

programme.title: Inkheart (?)
programme.desc: Mo Folchart possesses the unusual ability to make characters he reads about in books come to life. When he unleashes a fictional villain to cause mayhem in the real world, Mo and his daughter must find a way to put him back in the book. Fantasy adventure based on Cornelia Funke's novel, starring Brendan Fraser, Andy Serkis and Helen Mirren(n)

programme.title: The Way Back (?)
programme.desc: Siberian gulag prisoners stage a daring escape during the Second World War. Refusing to live under Stalin's rule, they embark on a gruelling 4,500-mile journey across inhospitable terrain to escape the Soviet Union. Peter Weir's drama, starring Ed Harris, Colin Farrell, Saoirse Ronan, Jim Sturgess and Mark Strong(n)

programme.title: Ted (?)
programme.desc: A lonely boy makes a wish at Christmas that his teddy bear will come to life, which is magically granted. The boy grows up to become a directionless slacker, with the foul-mouthed living toy still his inseparable friend - but his girlfriend thinks it is time for him to grow up. Comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg and Mila Kunis, directed by and featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane(n)

programme.title: The Stag (?)
programme.desc: A timid man planning his wedding refuses to have a stag night, instead arranging a peaceful weekend's walking holiday for him and his best man. Comedy, starring Hugh O'Conor, Andrew Scott and Peter McDonald(n)

The reality of Lara's business starts to affect her marriage(n)

programme.title: Black Christmas (2006)

Oliver Hudson and Andrea Martin costar in this effective holiday scream-fest from writer/director Glen Morgan(n)

programme.title: Reaper

programme.title: The Day

programme.title: Backcountry

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio(n)

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape(n)

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her(n)

programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape(n)

Nick Cassavetes, Sherilyn Fenn, Griffin O'Neal and Randy Quaid costar in this cult classic, a late-night television favorite(n)

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries are chosen to carry out a covert operation deep in a former Soviet State that sends them into a maze of tunnels inhabited by menacing creatures and towards an underground laboratory where they must secure specimens of genetically engineered human and alien hybrids(n)

programme.title: When Time Expires

programme.title: Alec Mapa: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Alec Mapa's heartfelt and hilarious film of his one-man show exploring the challenges of adopting a five-year-old foster child with his husband. Includes behind-the-scenes footage of his family's home life on a busy show day(n)

programme.title: Steve-O: Guilty As Charged
programme.desc: Comedy special starring comedian, author and all-round lunatic Steve-O, who went from humble beginnings as a circus clown to hitting the big time in 'Jackass'. Expect the unexpected as he performs hilariously outrageous stunts and riotous tricks that hold nothing back(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder - The Rise of Taj
programme.desc: Kal Penn stars in this sequel to the comedy smash "Van Wilder" as the protege to a legendary party animal, who sets out to prove his skills by transforming a stodgy British school of higher learning into the new Eurpean capital of rowdy, raunchy fun(n)

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV(n)

programme.title: Lost in the Sun

programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think(n)

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: Refuge

When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have(n)

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse(n)

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage in his hilarious comedy special where he gives his homegrown New Yorker take on everything from the joy of ice cream to the pain of political correctness(n)

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think(n)

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between(n)

programme.title: Hannibal Rising
programme.desc: Author Thomas Harris teams with director Peter Webber to present this horrifying, gripping prequel that reveals the origins of future serial killer Hannibal Lecter (Gaspard Ulliel), a frightened Lithuanian refugee from World War II who uses his razor-sharp mind to acquire the skills that will enable him to get grisly revenge on the soldiers that murdered his family. Gong Li costars in this dark, surprising chapter in the Lecter mythos(n)

programme.title: Spring Breakers
programme.desc: After four college girls are busted for robbing a fast food shack to fund their spring break, they are unexpectedly bailed out by an infamous local thug who lures them into a criminal underbelly and takes them on a wild, violent and riotous vacation. Stars Selena Gomez and James Franco(n)

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Seeking to exorcise the demons of a tragedy that still haunts her, an outdoorsy woman (Shauna Macdonald) and her five best friends spend a weekend spelunking in the Appalachian Mountains - but a wrong turn down a remote cave system lands them at the doorstep of strange, flesh-craving creatures. Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall(n)

programme.title: Forbidden Kingdom
programme.desc: A young martial arts enthusiast travels back in time to ancient China, where he teams up with a drunken master and a beautiful warrior maiden to fight an evil wizard and free the mythical "Monkey King." Legendary action stars Jackie Chan and Jet Li finally unite for this fun-filled adventure(n)

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen(n)

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: Classic tale of the comic misadventures of a young Peruvian bear who travels to London in search of a home and finds himself lost and alone in Paddington Station until he meets a family who takes him in. It looks as though his luck has changed until he catches the eye of a sinister museum taxidermist, who has an old score to settle. Features Sally Hawkins, Hugh Bonneville, Nicole Kidman and the voice of Ben Whishaw(n)

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: Documentary from Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney that explores the phenomenon of Stuxnet, a self-replicating computer virus discovered in 2010 that was allegedly commissioned by the US and Israeli governments to sabotage Iran's nuclear program that opened up a Pandora's box of cyber warfare(n)

programme.title: TRUMPED: Inside the Greatest Political Upset of All Time
programme.desc: An intimate behind the scenes look into the biggest political upset in recent US history. Mark Halperin, John Heilemann and Mark McKinnon follow the rise of Donald Trump from the primaries through the debates to the drama of election night, featuring a trove of never-before-seen footage secured during the making of the SHOWTIME documentary series 'The Circus.'(n)

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)(n)

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Heath Ledger and Jake Gyllenhaal star in director Ang Lee's acclaimed adaptation of Annie Proulx’s story of the relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years(n)

programme.title: Ghost Busters

programme.title: Open Water

Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis(n)

programme.title: Channel Sex News

Meanwhile, a series of interconnected stories of drug lords, corrupt cops and a protected high profile witness unfold. Also stars Catherine Zeta-Jones, Benicio Del Toro and Don Cheadle(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend

programme.title: Last Knights

programme.title: A Perfect Day

programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, `Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia. (live) (cc)(n)
